mapper.select: SELECT srn.store_code,nr.id,nr.number_type,nr.prefix,nr.mid_number,nr.tail_number,nr.tail_format_type FROM sm_store_relation_numrule srn LEFT JOIN sm_numbering_rule nr ON srn.rule_id = nr.id WHERE nr.number_type = #{numberType} AND srn.store_code = #{storeCode}

SELECT srn.store_code,nr.id,nr.number_type,nr.prefix,nr.mid_number,nr.tail_number,nr.tail_format_type FROM sm_store_relation_numrule srn LEFT JOIN sm_numbering_rule nr ON srn.rule_id = nr.id WHERE prefix = #{prefix} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into sm_numbering_rule( number_type, prefix, mid_number, tail_number, tail_format_type ) values ( #{numberType}, #{prefix}, #{midNumber}, #{tailNumber}, #{tailFormatType} )
